mapper.select: /*하담푸드 대시보드 최근 14일 근태현황 (Dash14Mapper.getUserGroupDash) */ select to_char(work_dt , 'MM-DD') as work_dt , count(user_id) as user_count from user_work a where to_char(work_dt , 'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_char(now() + '-2 week' , 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(now() , 'YYYY-MM-DD') and cust_no = #{custNo} and used_yn = 'Y' group by work_dt order by to_char(work_dt , 'YYYY-MM-DD')
